snippet: Jeh C. Johnson, the Obama administration’s top lawyer at the Pentagon, will step down at the end of December, the military said on Thursday.
abstract: Jeh C Johnson, Obama administration’s top lawyer at the Pentagon, will step down at the end of December.
lead_paragraph: Jeh C. Johnson, the Obama administration’s top lawyer at the Pentagon, will step down at the end of December, the military said on Thursday.

headline.main: Washington: Pentagon’s Top Lawyer Is Leaving
